alert.note: Alert for Jewell; Mitchell; Osborne (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 09 at 9:48PM CST until March 10 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Storm total accumulations of generally 5 to 7 inches, although the presence of narrow, heavier snow bands will likely result in noticeable differences over short distances. * WHERE...Portions of north central Kansas and extreme south central Nebraska counties along the Kansas border. * WHEN...Until 6 PM CST Thursday, although the vast majority of snow should fall before Noon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions with reduced visibility. Most of the snow will fall overnight into Thursday morning, and will impact the Thursday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Although limited blowing and drifting snow is likely, sustained north-northeast winds will only average 10 to 20 MPH, keeping significant drifting from being a major issue.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
